H0.text: In Greek mythology, who was the first wife of Aegeus. Chalciope

H1.text: In Greek mythology, who was the first wife of Aegeus. Aethra

H2.text: In Greek mythology, who was the first wife of Aegeus. Alcippe

H3.text: In Greek mythology, who was the first wife of Aegeus. Meta

A4.text: Aegeus' first wife was Meta, daughter of Hoples

A5.text: Aegeus' second wife was Chalciope, daughter of Rhexenor
